str2: Although, though. From kai and per; and indeed, i.e. Nevertheless or notwithstanding.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Confidence, trust, reliance. From the perfect of the alternate of pascho; reliance.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb, doko dok'-o of the same meaning; to think; by implication, to seem.
A primary verb; to convince; by analogy, to pacify or conciliate; reflexively or passively, to assent, to rely.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
More, rather. Neuter of the comparative of the same as malista; more) or rather.
